channel.title: How do I make a private server for moparscape 3.2?
channel.description:
:eek:OMG! i dont know how to make a server! Could you tell me how?? or send me a link??
~Timewaster
P.S. I might ask the same question over and over because im stupid :P :P :P :P or might not get it

item.title: How do I make a private server for moparscape 3.2?
item.dc:creator: @Timewaster Timewaster
item.description:
@Timewaster wrote:

Aftermath_96:

Now open it up gently with a Phillips 4-head screwdriver. See the red wire? No, not that one, the other red wire. Yes, that one. Cut it, and the blue wire next to it. Tape the red and blue heads together with Scotch tape, and close your router back. For the final touch, take out all the wires from your router and throw it against the wall.

…

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make a private server for moparscape 3.2?

item.title: How do I make a private server for moparscape 3.2?
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

Now open it up gently with a Phillips 4-head screwdriver. See the red wire? No, not that one, the other red wire. Yes, that one. Cut it, and the blue wire next to it. Tape the red and blue heads together with Scotch tape, and close your router back. For the final touch, take out all the wires from your router and throw it against the wall.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make a private server for moparscape 3.2?
item.dc:creator: @Timewaster Timewaster
item.description:
@Timewaster wrote:

[quote=“csrsniper254, post:4, topic:40947”]strength don’t say anything unless you know what you are talking about… He is not asking for a premade server he wants to know how to make his own.

This will get you started. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,37596.0.html[br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2006, 07:09:00 PM[/size][hr]And you don’t download a server you download a source…[/quote]

It says I have to go into my router. How???[br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2006, 08:11:28 AM[/size][hr][quote=“str by zammy, post:2, topic:40947”][quote author=Timewaster link=topic=57407.msg706866#msg706866 date=1167454613]
:eek:OMG! i dont know how to make a server! Could you tell me how?? or send me a link??

~Timewaster

P.S. I might ask the same question over and over because im stupid or might not get it
[/quote]

Go to downloads to download a server and if you repeat this over and over again then you will get banned! its called spamming[/quote]

U r a jerk

Read full topic
